programme.title: The Duke
programme.desc: The faithful canine companion to the Duke of Dingwall, Hubert, inherits the Duke’s estate and turns the world of high society upside down. With Hubert’s new legal guardian being the Butler’s niece, this unlikely duo have a hard time fitting into their new world. The Duke’s conniving nephew believes the two to be a royal pain and will stop at no cost to steal the inheritance, even if it means marrying into the “Dukedome” via their pet poodle. A dog’s tale of love and devotion that will have your family sitting up and begging for more!

programme.title: A Random Encounter
programme.desc: A dual perspective, he-said, she-said, romantic comedy about two twenty-somethings (Laura and Kevin) trying to make it in Hollywood and their chance encounter at a local coffee shop that takes you on an entertaining journey of misunderstandings, bad timing, and almost missed chances. Starring Meghan Markle (TV's Suites) as Laura's superficial single roommate, Mindy, the couple must fight for their relationship to survive the craziness that is show business. A Random Encounter is a roller-coaster ride that proves finding your Prince Charming can be a right royal pain.

programme.title: Pup Star: World Tour
programme.desc: Pup Star is back and bigger than ever as the hit singing-pup competition show goes global! After achieving international stardom, Tiny the adorable Yorkie joins the celebrity judges for the first-ever Pup Star World Tour. The judges each welcome their favourite contestant from around the world to the Pup Star pack, training them to compete for the new title of global pup star champion. India's Raji joins Team Growl, China's Ming joins Team Paw-Paw, Nigeria's Mobo joins Team Gnarley, and Mexico's dashing telenovela star Julio joins Team Tiny.

programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor (Amanda Bynes) has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem? He's Jason Masters (Chris Carmack), the world's biggest rock star. Hoping for a chance to get close to her idol, Jenny takes a job in his favourite Caribbean resort with her best friend Ryan (Jonathan Bennett). When Jason is washed overboard in a storm, Jenny jumps in to save him and the pair find themselves stranded on a seemingly-deserted tropical island.

programme.title: A Few Less Men
programme.desc: The wedding that brought the now-married David (Xavier Samuel: Twilight, Fury) and his best buddies Tom (Kris Marshall: Love Actually, Death in Paradise) and Graham (Kevin Bishop A Few Best Men) to the Blue Mountains is done and dusted. But their mate Luke has done himself a mischief – as you do, after the speeches – by getting drunk and falling off a cliff. Our boys suddenly find themselves transporting their friend’s corpse back to London.

programme.title: Entanglement
programme.desc: Entanglement' is a charmingly quirky romantic comedy with a twist! While searching for the meaning of his existence, Ben Layton (Thomas Middleditch: 'Silicon Valley') uncovers a family secret that leads him to a woman named Hanna (Jess Weixler: 'The Good Wife') who might have almost been his adopted sister. But when he and Hanna inadvertently fall in love, and his life becomes increasingly and weirdly complicated, Ben starts to realise that everything is incredibly connected and love may give him a new lease on life.

programme.title: Inside Chinese Football
programme.desc: Chinese football is in dire straits to the great despair of the country fans but not for lack of money since local clubs lavish outrageous amounts of money to attract foreign players and coaches. So why can’t China enjoy the same success in football as in other sports? To solve this enigma you need a total immersion into the strange and somewhat surrealist world of Chinese football. This provocative film goes beyond the strict sports analysis. It is an illustration of the shortcomings of a system not used to give such an image of failure to the rest of the world.

programme.title: The blue realm

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: SEVE - Artist, Fighter, Legend
programme.desc: Seve Ballesteros was an artist, a golfing Picasso. He was a fighter against back injury, rivals on the golf course, a disintegrating swing, and finally cancer. He remains a legend, a multi-major champion and the man who made the modern Ryder Cup. This is his story, from members of his inner circle, other sporting greats and from himself via newly unearthed material.

programme.title: Inside Kilian Jornet
programme.desc: For Kilian Jornet, the world's greatest mountain athlete, the arrival of his thirties coincided with the best and worst year of his life. This documentary follows Jornet through an intense 10-day tour of 10 cities around the world, allowing the public to see, for the first time, everything that goes on around the professional athlete, and revealing his lesser-known, uninhibited side. Between presentations, interviews, and brand commitments, and with only a few hours' sleep, the athlete reflects on a year marked by injuries his search for the balance between competition and personal projects and the arrival of his first daughter.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal is a story about will, dreams, determination, faith, rebellion, courage and love. The film invites us on a journey through Sadio´s different and highly diverse worlds - from the rural life in a small village in the far south of Senegal to the spotlight of world football by playing for Liverpool FC, even winning the Champions Leagues as number 10 with the world watching… The interaction of animations, documentary scenes, a diverse set of in-depth interviews and archive footage brings Sadio´s past to life and creates an exciting and emotional plot.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Killer in the Caves
programme.desc: About 6.5 million bats have died in the last six years in North America. A disease is driving the Little Brown Bats to extinction and causes mass mortalities among other bat species. The epidemic is still a riddle, but bat-experts piece together information like criminal investigators. The ingenuity of the scientists is captured through astonishing experiments and groundbreaking technology in an effort to understand this mysterious disease and learn more about this common yet unknown animal.

programme.title: The Okinaway of Life

programme.title: Flirting With Flamenco
programme.desc: When Sylvia's well-meaning dad (Watt) surprises her with a devastating revelation, Sylvia's world is turned upside down. But will she crumble or prove herself at the local flamenco contest? An uplifting feel-good Brit comedy drama, Flirting with Flamenco will have you laughing, crying and feeling empowered to turn your life around.

programme.title: Colossal Youth
programme.desc: Colossal Youth follows four friends Ryder (Troy Osterberg), Greg (Riker Lynch), Erica (Kimmy Caruso) and Jordan (Reese Everett Ryan) as they navigate life, love and the wild and crazy times of high school. Ryder is a hopeless romantic and when his dream girl obsession Siobhan (Alexa Dowd) returns to school he goes for broke trying to win her heart. His pursuits lead him to rock bottom, but it's there that he realizes his real love has been beside him all along.

programme.title: Three Chen Sisters: Three Chen Sisters
programme.desc: Jennifer, the older sister struggles with singleness Amanda, the middle sister, deals with her lack of excitement in life and the youngest daughter tries to come to terms with her Chinese identity. Watch these three Chinese American women deal with their cultural identity and navigate their complicated lives through dating, career, school, and family in Southern California.

programme.title: Finding Joy
programme.desc: A struggling writer rediscovers himself, his offbeat family, and what it means to be happy when he meets Joy – a spirited, possibly-dying young woman who asks him to write her obituary.

programme.title: Soundtrack to Sixteen
programme.desc: Soundtrack to Sixteen is a coming-of-age film about two anxious teens growing up in London in the 2000s. Maisy is self-conscious and constantly overanalysing. She is obsessed with having her first kiss this year, before she turns seventeen, but stalking the boy next door doesn't seem to be working. Meanwhile Ben, a boy from a nearby school, is happy being a nerd and thinking he's better than everyone else until his grades start plummeting. For the first time he must come face to face with the idea that he might, in fact, be average. When the two meet each other on the night bus things get even more confusing for them as they attempt to navigate their first potential romance under the stress of exams that will define their future.

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: The Limping Assassin S01 E01
programme.desc: It’s the Commonwealth Conference in Scotland, but there’s intelligence that suggests a planned assassination attempt on The Queen. Taking his new role very seriously, Hubble soon manages to upset foreign ambassadors, colleagues, hotel guests and even the restaurant pianist as he haphazardly carries out his security checks. An attractive woman spells trouble as he gives away vital security information – and soon has to go all out to save her Majesty

programme.title: The Royal Bodyguard: Bullets Over Broad Street S01 E02
programme.desc: Hubble enlists the help of his aspirant sniffer dog Winston as he continues in his new role of Royal Bodyguard. It’s the Queen’s birthday, but Hubble soon stumbles into calamity and is forced to take a few days break at a health spa – where he comes across a familiar face and his planned relaxation is suddenly shelved. Hubble returns to duty in time to oversee Her Majesty’s visit to an Oxford Museum, which is far from straightforward.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Malta- Laura visits a re-enactment of La Guardia, which represents a military performance that used to take place in the time of the Knights of St. John. Plus, the walled city of Mdina then Valletta Gozo, The Blue Grotto, St. Paul's Catacombs, and the Temple of Hagar Qim. Finally, Laura rounds out her trip with an excursion to Ggantia, the oldest free-standing structure in the world.

programme.title: Elizabeth Stanton's Great Big World
programme.desc: Park City-It's winter fun with Elizabeth and friends in Park City, Utah where they zip line, go on snowmobile adventures and cross country fun with snowshoeing.

programme.title: World War Four
programme.desc: A series of escalating incidents around the world lead to greater and greater conflict, placing the superpowers at one another's throats. Armies march, bombs rain down, soldiers storm the beaches. One family is caught up in the ever-growing conflict. Can they survive as total war is declared and nuclear weapons are unleashed

programme.title: Lords of the Mafia
programme.desc: The Mafia in Italy Today- Reestablishing their ties to the ancestral homeland, American Mafiosi have rediscovered an old partner in crime. In Palermo, local crime bosses have moved into the big time by supplying New York mobsters with heroin from Pakistan and Afghanistan. The Sicilians and Neapolitan Camorra criminals have become rich and powerful, and now influence business and government in Rome. At the top of the heap sits Salvatore Reina, boss of bosses.

programme.title: Real Vice Cops
programme.desc: Ride-along access from local police agencies and clearance to the highest profile cases that chronicles the exploits of REAL vice squads all across the United States. In cities like Memphis, Las Vegas, Miami, Detroit, Atlanta, Dallas and Orlando our crews ride along with these urban warriors, and plunge the viewer into the action right along with them.

programme.title: My Guardian Angel
programme.desc: Eleven year old autistic Hannah has already experienced the unbearable burden of loss when her beloved twin sister Angel died while living under the same roof with her abusive and uninvolved parents. She finds comfort in that she is still deeply connected to her dead twin sister.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Dublin- O'Donoghue's pub, the Ha' Penny Bridge, Powers Court Center, Oscar Wilde's old home. Laura stops at the National Museum of Ireland, the Temple Bar, and the banks of the River Liffey.

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: B-Sides covers Austin City Limits 2021 featuring interviews with performers Zella Day, AG Club, and Surfaces.

programme.title: Lords of the Mafia
programme.desc: Japanese Yakuza- Organized crime syndicates from Japan are now a major menace all over the Pacific Rim. Also known as the "boryokudan," which means "the violent ones," they are feared for their ruthlessness and strict codes of violence. Their "Little Caesar" is the flamboyant Yoshinori Watanabe, who was inducted in 1989 as "kumicho" (boss of bosses), presiding over the 105 "oyabun" (bosses) of Japan's 750 Yakuza gangs. With 22,000 soldiers, Watanabe's outfit — the Yamaguchi-gumi — is easily the largest and most powerful.

Also known as the "boryokudan," which means "the violent ones," they are feared for their ruthlessness and strict codes of violence. Their "Little Caesar" is the flamboyant Yoshinori Watanabe, who was inducted in 1989 as "kumicho" (boss of bosses), presiding over the 105 "oyabun" (bosses) of Japan's 750 Yakuza gangs. With 22,000 soldiers, Watanabe's outfit — the Yamaguchi-gumi — is easily the largest and most powerful.

programme.title: Asia Unplated with Diana Chan
programme.desc:
Asia Unplated follows Diana Chan as she explores the fresh, aromatic flavours of Asia. Each episode focuses on a different cuisine, showcasing a variety of traditional and modern dishes from each country.
Along the way, we join Diana as she explores the local shops, restaurants and markets, providing tips and advice for sourcing ingredients for each dish.
Then it’s back to her kitchen where Diana cooks up simple but authentic, home-style Asian dishes. She also invites special guests, friends and passionate foodies into the kitchen to show us their favourite recipes and chat about the unique cooking styles and rich food histories of their favorite Asian cuisines.

programme.title: James Bond: For Our Eyes Only
programme.desc: In 1953, James Bond first emerged as a character in Ian Fleming's novel ‘Casino Royale’, and just nine years later the spy was the protagonist in the film ‘Dr. No’ – thus starting one of the longest and most successful franchises in the history of cinema. Beautiful women, exhilarating stunts, breath-taking locales and the charm of a handsome English secret agent have formed the essential ingredients of all Bond films. Recount and relive all of 007’s menacing missions, from the first feature film production in 1962 to the highly anticipated ‘No Time To Die’.

programme.title: Aliens: Are We Alone?
programme.desc: Does alien life exist out there in the Universe? Scientists are now getting closer than ever to answering that question thanks to the Kepler Space Telescope. This revolutionary spacecraft is on a mission to find habitable alien planets. Thanks to Kepler, we now know of thousands of possible planets and we’re getting closer than ever to finding the holy grail: a twin of our Earth. We use CGI to bring these alien worlds to life, and with the help of scientists, we speculate on what extra-terrestrial life might be like.

programme.title: Jack Pierce: The Maker Of Monsters
programme.desc: In today's cinematic world of digital effects, telling what is real from what was created in a computer is impossible. But there was a time when Hollywood relied on nothing more than an artist's ability to create a boogie man with grease paint, cotton, glue, hair, and a few simple materials to draw people into the theatre to be chilled and thrilled.

programme.title: Waking The Titanic
programme.desc: Waking the Titanic is something special, a living history told on a small, but no less poignant human scale. Through stylised re-enactments, the docudrama recreates the story of the Addergoole 14 and what happened to them on the Titanic. The story is told using detailed accounts handed down to family members from the people of the time and interviews with the descendents of 3 who survived.

programme.title: Switzerland: Hitler's Bankers
programme.desc: A series of unprecedented revelations explains how Germany was able to finance its huge war expenses. The war might have ended in 1943 had Switzerland not recycled the gold looted by the Nazis throughout Europe and France.

programme.title: It Takes a Thief
programme.desc: Single females, Marlene and Katrina see the madness in their security methods as they protect their unlocked home in a wholly unorthodox manner. Resident thief John shows them how their own security ideas can work precariously against them!

programme.title: ICEolation
programme.desc: Antarctica is a place few get to visit, let alone connect with. This is the story of two paddlers with adventurous spirits, whom when presented with an unique opportunity to undertake a self-supported sea kayak expedition in Antarctica, took it. Took it as an opportunity to go beyond adrenalin-based desires and the pleasing of engorged ego’s and instead explore as much within themselves as explore the magical, ice-littered waterways of the Antarctic Peninsula. Throughout the narrative, the theme of the film – connection – is woven in, along with an insight into the preparations necessary for an expedition of this magnitude. Together with candid images of the complexities of daily life in this unique environment, this story aims to inspire other adventurous folk to do more than explore just the physical realm of whatever incredible wilderness they next find themselves in. For there really is so much more to explore. Finalist - VIMFF 2020. Winner - World Tour Paddling Film Festival 2020. Best NZ Made Film - New Zealand Mountain Film 2019. Finalist - Audience Awards 2019. Official Selection 2020: Nature Track Film Festival. Official Selections 2019: Adventure Outdoor Fest, Adventure Shorts Film Festival, Cradle Mountain Film Festival, Kendal Mountain Film Festival, Polar Film Festival, AMA.

programme.title: Ancient Splendors of Rome
programme.desc: Two major events occurred in the same period 2,000 years ago. The Colosseum, the largest human-made structure on the earth, was completed (AD 80), and Pompeii disappeared from history in one day due to the explosion of Vesuvius Volcano (AD79), the largest disaster on earth that mankind suffered. These two events serve as precious windows to understand the whole political culture and economic society of Rome, the Millennium Empire, beyond time and space.

programme.title: Doomsday Volcanoes
programme.desc: April, 2010 and a relatively small Icelandic volcano turns much of the Northern Hemisphere into an ash-strewn no-fly zone. From Miami to Moscow flights are grounded, hundreds of thousands of people are stranded, but Eyjafjallajkull was just the start.

programme.title: The Last Dukes
programme.desc: Dukedoms are created by the Monarch - for reasons ranging from a grateful nation rewarding a major war leader to a king acknowledging his illegitimate son. What is it to be a Duke in the 21st Century?

Ray was an irresponsible, free-spending, arrogant, obnoxious, alcohol-abusing, miserable human being, who was also arguably the best guitarist in the world. We follow Ray's life: bouts of getting drunk, his bizzare hobbies of shooting rats and watching passing trains, his dreams of fame and fortune, his strange obsession with the better-known guitarist Django Reinhardt, and of course, playing his beautiful music.

All is fair in love and war.

programme.title: Frankie Fraser's Last Stand
programme.desc: From the Krays to the Great Train Robbery. Unravel the fascinating truth about London's gangland from the man who's outlasted them all, Mad Frankie Fraser, notorious for his involvement in Britain's gangland culture throughout the 20th century. He's been part of the most famous criminal gangs of the past 100 years, while maintaining his South London roots and deep devotion to his family. Intense!

programme.title: 3 Hearts
programme.desc: One night in provincial France, Marc (Benoît Poelvoorde) meets Sylvie (Charlotte Gainsbourg) after missing his train back to Paris. Instantly and intensely drawn to one another, they wander through the streets until morning in rare, almost choreographed, harmony. A thwarted plan for a second meeting sends each in a separate direction - Sylvie reunites with her ex and leaves France Marc falls in love and marries. What neither knows is that Marc's new bride is Sylvie's sister, Sophie (Chiara Mastroianni).

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: 1879, nine-year-old Maria Sautuola and her father, Marcelino, discover the first cave art and accomplished paintings of galloping bison. But Maria's mother, devout Conchita, is disturbed at the idea that prehistoric savages could have created such magnificent art. The Catholic Church sees this as an attack on Biblical truth. And Carthailac, the leading prehistorian, condemns Marcelino and his discovery as fakes. The family is thrown into crisis and the cave locked up. It takes all their love for each other to find a way through to redemption and recognition.

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: Black or White is the story of a grandfather who is suddenly left to care for his beloved granddaughter. When her paternal grandmother seeks custody with the help of her brother, the little girl is torn between two families who love her deeply. With the best intentions at heart, both families fight for what they feel is right and are soon forced to confront their true feelings about race, forgiveness and understanding. Anchored by an all-star cast and inspired by true events, Black or White is a look at two seemingly different worlds, in which nothing is as simple as black or white.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: Based on the astonishing true story of a teenage German solider whose sadism would eventually earn him the nickname of the Executioner of Emsland. The Captain picks up two weeks before the end of the war. A petrified soldier, fleeing military police, finds a Nazi captain’s uniform to wear and avoid execution. Thus disguised and high on the terrifying charisma of his clothing, he invents a secret mission from the Führer and embarks on a brutal odyssey of torture and slaughter. Directed by Robert Schwentke (The Time Travelers Wife, Flight Plan and Red).

programme.title: Shock and Awe
programme.desc: SHOCK AND AWE is a thought-provoking political thriller based on the shocking true events in the aftermath of 9/11. In the wake of the 9/11 terrorist attacks, a group of journalists working for Knight Ridder and covering George Bush's planned invasion of Iraq in 2003 are sceptical of the president's claim that Saddam Hussein was hiding weapons of mass destruction. Journalists Jonathan Landay (Woody Harrelson) and Warren Strobel (James Marsden) decide to play on very dangerous territory by challenging the White House.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor unearths a 2000-year-old nightmare - a secret that should have remained buried. A team of scientists, who lose a colleague in an ancient labyrinth, must work together to recover him while trying to make the discovery of a century. In their quest to rescue him, they find themselves underground, battling ancient, terrifying Chinese magic and making their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating spiders – only to uncover the secret behind the insects’ power and intelligence.

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Juggling some angry Russians, the British Mi5, his impossibly leggy wife and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part time rogue Charlie Mortdecai (Johnny Depp) must traverse the globe armed only with his good looks and special charm in a race to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain the code to a lost bank account filled with Nazi gold.

programme.title: Invasion Planet Earth
programme.desc: After the death of his young daughter, Tom Dunn is a broken man. When his wife falls pregnant again, he cannot believe their luck. However, his joy is short-lived, as, on the very same day, the people of Earth become plagued with terrifying visions of the end of the world. When a gigantic, all-consuming alien mothership appears in the sky and launches a ruthless attack on Earth's cities, chaos and destruction follow. Tom must find the strength and wisdom to save his wife and unborn child. However, first he must confront a shocking truth. A truth which threatens the key to the survival of the human race. The ultimate war for Planet Earth is about to begin...

programme.title: Rise of the Viking
programme.desc: From the director of epic fantasy favourite, 'Black Sails', and starring 'Breaking Bad's' Jonathan Banks, is historical actioner 'Rise of the Viking'. In the year of 754 AD, during a time of epic battles and bloodshed, the legend of the pagan warrior King Redbad, is born, but so is a new weapon against his people: Christianity. Redbad must ultimately unite a Viking army powerful enough to defeat the seemingly invincible Franks.

programme.title: Gutshot Straight
programme.desc: A professional poker player falls deep into the underworld when he takes an unexpected wager from a mysterious high roller. In order to protect himself and his family, he must try and get to the truth as he’s forced into a murder plot making him the prime target for revenge. This action thriller’s star cast includes George Eads (TV's CSI), AnnaLynne McCord (TV's 90210), Steven Seagal (A Good Man, Hard to Kill), Vinnie Jones (Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels, Snatch), Stephen Lang (Avatar), Tia Carrere (Wayne’s World, True Lies) and Ted Levine (American Gangster, Shutter Island).
